resources.string: Test your knowledge with this customizable practice test.
Go over all test answers in a nice organized way. Similar to a cheat sheet.
Review your previous attempts and see how much you\'ve improved.
Simple flash cards for efficient studying, if that\'s your style.
Quick and simple way to go over street signs. This is for signs only.
Official DMV handbook available for download in PDF format.
Find your local DMV office and schedule an appointment.
Help make this app better by adding on to it and/or making sure it\'s up-to-date.
Change the way this app is presented to you for a more pleasurable experience.
